entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
